page.title: Pirate Guild
page.t: ** Used in the News Network, double check display in the news browser, \n used to go to next line.
Pirate Guild: ECS Not Detected - Communications with ships and stations will be disabled!
Pirate Guild import will now be completed and the plugin will be activated.
\033RPirate Guild - LU Edition:\033X \033WDynamic AI and Guild System\033X [\033Ybuild %s]\033X
[author]Anarkis Federation[/author] [b]Pirate Guild[/b] has been enabled - Have Fun !
[author]Anarkis Federation[/author] [b]Pirate Guild[/b] has been upgraded to v%s !
Upgrading Pirate Guild to v%s, please wait ...

[author]Anarkis Federation[/author]New major version of [b]Pirate Guild[/b] detected, you will need to manually disable the plugin in the [b]Artificial Life[/b] menu, wait for a confirmation message, and re-enable it.
\033RPirate Guild - LU Edition:\033X \033WLoading in progress, please wait ...\033X
\033RPirate Guild - LU Edition:\033X \033WActivate to Complete Import\033X
\033GYour Standing:\033X\n- Pirate Guild : \033Y%s\033X points < \033Y%s\033X >\n- Other Pirates : \033Y%s\033X points < \033Y%s\033X >
\n\033GYou are a member of the Guild\033X
\n\033RYou are not a member of the Guild\033X
\nThe faction currently targeted by the Guild is : \033R%s\033X
\nOur Mobile HQ is currently located in : \033Y%s\033X
Pay a tribute to the Guild
Are you sure you wish to pay \033Y%s credits\033X ?
\nYou do not have enough money to do so.\n
Giving money to the Guild will increase your reputation\nand strengthen the local pirate base.
How much do you want to give ?

Donating ships to the Guild will increase your reputation and\nstrengthen the local Pirate base. You can only donate M4-, M3-, and \nM6-class ships, and it must first be docked at the local Pirate base.
Sorry,\nWe do not have enough ships to do any kind of raid at the moment.\nPlease, try again later
Sorry,\nYour standing with us is too low. (you need at least %s notoriety points)

Welcome !
Please choose an option and a target to get the price of our services.
\033YSpecial offer :\033X Raids against the %s are at a discount price !
Sorry,\nnot enough ships are available to attack that kind of target !
Sorry,\nYou do not have enough money in your account.
Thank you !\nOur ships will be sent to attack the specified target !
[author]Galactic Police[/author]You have received %s credits for the destruction of a %s that was owned by the Pirate Guild in sector %s. Thank you for your assistance.
[author]Pirate Guild Channel[/author]Thank you for your help against our enemies. You have received %s credits as a reward.\n
Recent Guild reports indicate the \033R%ss\033X are currently the faction who have dealt the most damage to our forces. Consequently, Guild HQ orders all bases to prioritize %s for targetting.

In light of increased combat situations between our forces and \033R%s\033X security services, Guild HQ has decided to deploy an invasion fleet to sector \033R%s\033X and make them pay for their their insolence. All members are invited to join in our retribution.
The %s in sector \033G%s\033X reports that it has sent a raiding party to \033R%s\033X in \033R%s\033X territory. Guild members operating in in the area are welcome to join in this operation.

The %s in sector \033G%s\033X informs us that a fleet has been launched against the \033R%s\033X in \033R%s\033X in order to reduce %s defensive capacities. We`ve also been informed that a prize will be given to the one who delivers the last blow.
Our base in sector \033G%s\033X informs us that a squadron of fighters has been launched against the \033R%s\033X in \033R%s\033X.
Our compatriot pirates in \033G%s\033X are proud to announce that they have purchased a new \033G%s\033X to defend their Pirate Base.

We are sorry to inform you that our base in \033G%s\033X has been destroyed. Despite the efforts of our fighters, the base was finally destroyed by hostile \033R%s\033X security forces. The Guild headquarters has been informed, and a counter-offensive is likely to launched in a few weeks.
Our base in \033G%s\033X sector has been attacked by hostile forces.
We are proud to announce that a new \033YMobile Headquarters\033X has been produced by our engineers.
Sadly our \033YMobile HQ\033X has been defeated in %s. It was destroyed by a %s.
We are proud to announce that a new \033YBrigantine Destroyer\033X has been produced by our engineers.
Sadly our \033Y%s destroyer\033X has been defeated in %s. It was destroyed by a %s.
A new Pleasure Dome has been built in %s.
A new frigate has been added to our defence grid, courtesy of the %s from %s
Our destroyer has been wiped out !
A new destroyer has been built
Our Mobile HQ has been destroyed !
A new Mobile HQ has been built
A new frigate has been built
Where is the nearest pirate base ?
Sorry, it`s none of my business.
Where is the nearest pirate shipyard ?
Is there any good cargo to loot around here ?
Do you really want to mess with the Guild ?
Oh, it`s you again.\nWhat do you want this time ?
Get off my comms channel! I`m busy!
Go away, I`ve nothing to say to you!
Hey, you ! \n\nYou attacked us earlier, you have to pay a tribute of %s credits to restore good relations with our homebase in %s sector.
You will find a %s in sector %s.
You will find a %s in sector %s, i`ve added the location to your map.
I won`t tell you. Go away !
Stop wasting my time, you don`t have enough money!
Are you on spaceweed ? It`s right here, in this sector!
I won`t share private guild information with you.\nGo away!\n
Sorry, I have nothing important to report.
Yes I`ve heard the following news : \n\n
How dare you contact us!\n\nGive us \033W%s credits\033X and we may let you leave here alive!
Okay, we`ll let you go, for now...
I`m being attacked by a \033W%s\033X, please help me !
Thanks ! I will pay you if you manage to kill him !
Thanks ! Here`s \033Y%s credits\033X for your help !
We are attacking a \033W%s\033X who should be in the \033W%s\033X sector. Let me see... Here`s his ID code: \033Y%s\033X
We are going to raid the \033W%s\033X sector, bro ! Come with us, there should be plenty of goods for us to plunder!
Nothing much, I`m just returning home
I`m patrolling the sector for the Guild
Are you looking for an escort ? You can hire me for %s credits
I`ll escort you for free, boss!
You can hire me as an escort for \033Y%s credits\033X for one hour. Are you interested ?
You want ME to escort YOU ? Are you kiddin` ? Get out of my face !
Escort duty finished. See you later.
I recently scanned a \033Y%s\033X in sector %s. Its ID was \033Y%s\033X.
No, I haven`t scanned anything interesting recently.
I don`t like the Yakis and I don`t want to talk about them...
No news about the Yakis to report, they are pretty quiet these days.
Recent reports from the Guild indicate the %s mobile base is in sector %s.
I read a report about them recently. There is at least %s Yaki mobile bases active in the Universe.
You will find a %s in sector %s, go through the %s.
Please forgive us, we won`t bother you any more.

For the correct price our hacker team can reset a hostile station back to blue. The price varies according to the jump range, the station class, and the owner. We can only hack stations within 5 jumps from here.

 \033YSelected:\033X %s - Class: %s
Race: %s - Distance: %s
 \033YPrice:\033X %s credits
\033YWanted Criminal :\033X Reward is %s credits for a confirmed death.\n\n
[author]%s[/author]Thank you for your help ! \n \nA ship is going to take me back to the base. Here`s %s credits for your trouble.
[author]Pirate Guild[/author]The %s military has successfully transferred our boss to the detention facility. The mission is failed.
[author]Pirate Guild[/author]Thank you for dispatching our foe !\n\nHere`s %s credits for your trouble.
[author]Pirate Guild[/author]Thank you for dispatching our foe !\n\nHere`s %s credits for your trouble.
[author]Pirate Guild HQ[/author]Thank you for your help in defending our base !\n\n In addition to the rewards you`ve earned killing those ships here`s a bonus of %s credits.
[author]Pirate Guild HQ[/author]Mission The %s military has successfully transferred our boss to the detention facility. The mission is failed.
[author]Pirate Guild HQ[/author]Thank you for your help in destroying this transport ship !\n\n Here`s %s credits for your trouble.
[author]Pirate Guild[/author]The %s TL has successfully reached its destination. The mission is failed.
Here are the missions currently available in the vicinity of this pirate base
No mission currently available near this location
Help a prisoner to escape : %s credits
Your mission is to help %s escape from a military TM and its escort. The convoy is currently in %s and is heading to %s. You must intercept and subdue it before it reaches the destination.
You`ll have to take care of %s, who is disrupting our activities in this region. He is currently flying a %s in %s. Its name will blink on your sector map if you accept the mission.
Take care of an enemy : %s credits
You`ll have to destroy the %s in %s. He has killed several of our pilots. His ship`s name will blink on your sector map if you accept the mission.
A Pirate Base is under attack in %s
Our base in %s is under attack by enemy forces, please help us by destroying enemies in this sector. Reward money given for the destruction of incoming is doubled.
A %s moving damaged police ship has been detected in %s. Wipe it out before it reaches %s. Its name will blink on your sector map if you accept the mission.
Use ADS to protect Pirate Bases
Do you want to enable debug output to logfile?
Set the relation between pirates and the player
Set the relation between the Pirate Guild and the player
Allow Pirate Guild ships to use the jumpdrive ?
Allow Pirate Guild ships to use the camouflage device ?
Select the strength of the guild
\033YVery Low:\033X Much fewer ships, slower build-up and activity
\033YHigh:\033X More ships, faster build-up and activity
Allow Pirate Guild capitals to use ADS tactics

\033YRules:\033X Whoever is closest to 21, without exceeding 21, wins. If you go over, you have lost. If your adversary has a higher score than you, you lose. Otherwise you`ve won. You start with one card - valued between 1 and 11 - and can ask for more. Once you`ve decided to stand, the dealer will continue until he decides to stop. Neither of you can receive more than 5 cards.

\033YYou :\033X %s points
\033YDealer :\033X %s points

That is a draw; nothing won, nothing lost. And no fun - want to try again?

\033YYou :\033X %s points
\033YDealer :\033X %s points

Congratulations! You win %s credits!
 Your luck must be quite strong today. Would you like to have another go?

\033YYou :\033X %s points
\033YDealer :\033X %s points

Too Bad ! You lost %s credits !
 Maybe you`ll be luckier next time. Another round?
Sorry, you don`t have enough money to play blackjack, you need at least 5000 credits available in your bank account.
A complete map of all \033W%s sectors\033X is available for \033Y%s credits\033X, are you interested?
The encyclopedia \033Wfull chapters about ships and weaponry\033X is available for \033Y%s credits\033X ! Are you interested?
Do you want to download \033WThe Hitchhiker`s Guide to the Galaxy\033X to your database for \033Y%s credits\033X?
We have a batch of \033W%s %ss\033X that we sell at a discount price of \033Y%s credits\033X, are you interested?
We have a batch of \033W%s %ss\033X that we sell at a discount price of \033Y%s credits\033X, are you interested?
We can hack a nearby hostile station for you, are you interested?

[author]Pirate Guild[/author] Welcome to the Pirate Guild ! 
 
[justify]You are now a full member. As a result, current targets of the Guild will blink on your sector map and a list of missions and targets is available at any pirate base. Moreover, hostile independent pirate ships will usually turn tail if you ask them to, except if you attack them first. Be sure to keep your notoriety to our Guild high enough or you will be expelled without warning. 
 
Welcome Aboard ! 
 
 [/justify]
We can hack hostile nearby stations to make them friendly to you, for the right price.
You do not have enough money to hack this station.
Are you sure you want to hack this station for %s credits?
